ygData.subject: Re: Stacking Songs
ygData.msgSnippet: A few notes of my own: (extra stuff snipped out) ... Stacks with L7 Whistling warsong ... No hard numbers or timing but these do seem to stack to me.  Also
ygData.messageBody:
A few notes of my own: (extra stuff snipped out)

>From: kim@...
>Subject: Re: [eqbards] Stacking Songs
>Date: Tue, 7 Sep 1999 13:09:12 -0400 (EDT)
>
>From: kim@...
>
>On Tue, 7 Sep 1999, JasonF wrote:
> >
>L1 Chant of Battle does not stack with Antehm nor Guardian
>Rhythms.
Stacks with L7 Whistling warsong

>L20 Binding attack speed decrease does not stack with Chain's
>attack speed decrease (haven't tested it yet with enchanter's
>spells)
>
>L23 Chain - see L20 Binding
No hard numbers or timing but these do seem to stack to me. Also they also
do appear to stack with enchanter debuffs

>L25 Psalm of Warmth does not stack with Elemental or Purifying
>Rhythms, nor other Psalm songs. The fire shield I hear does
>not stack with other fire shields.
Stacks with all non-cold based damage shields according to the ranger I
regularly group with, he loves this song.

>L32 Clarity supposedly *does* stack with multiple bards
>singing it.
Do not forget is stacks with Enchanter Clarity

>
>L33 Psalm of Cooling - See L25 Psalm of Warmth
I have heard this will actually debuff fire based damage shields. I do not
have this song yet though so I can not verify


>--
>John H. Kim
>kim@...
>


Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server
Master Craftsmen of Societus Argenti
